Returns: View Newly created view. Return null for the default behavior.
Parameters: View: The parent that the created view will be placed in; note that this may be null. This value may be null.
String: Tag name to be inflated. This value must never be null.
Context: The context the view is being created in. This value must never be null.
AttributeSet: Inflation attributes as specified in XML file. This value must never be null.
onCreateView(android.view.View,java.lang.Description: Version of @B_android#view#LayoutInflater#Factory#onCreateView_E@ that also supplies the parent that the view created view will be placed in.
onCreateView(android.view.View,java.lang.FullName: public abstract View onCreateView (View parent, String name, Context context, AttributeSet attrs)
